name: Avania Inn of Santa Barbara

reviews.text: We had stayed here when it was the Country Inn and loved it. The rehab was done on the cheap and eliminated little conveniences like bathroom hooks for PJs. The bed was hard (and I'm accustomed to an orthopedic mattress), and the modern-looking chair uncomfortable. The breakfast was great and the staff was quite helpful, except for the woman at the front desk. She was grumpy and made me feel as though I disturbed her by wanting to check-in (only at the appointed time--we were early and were sent away as was another lady). Also she was grumpy when we checked out. Definitely did not feel welcome, and will not return. At $212 on a Tuesday night, the room was not a bargain.
reviews.title: Never again
Great business hotel in SB
reviews.text: Barbara S.

When in Santa Barbara on biz travel you need to balance glitz with a hotel that delivers basic affordable biz amenities. The Avania is close to the beach and downtown, with fast free wifi connectivity, free parking, and a very personable and friendly manager. My team and I will return here soon for our biz in SB. You exceeded our expectations this week when 5 members of my team stayed at your property. Thank you very much for your hospitality.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although Castillo St. can be busy it is an excellent location for most everything. 101 on/off ramps are 2 minutes away. The beach is a 3 min. walk, the pier a 10 min walk, the marina 5 mins and State St. is a 5 min. drive or 10 min walk. Take your choice. The rooms are large and adequatly equiped. (When did you last have a surge protector 4 outlet extension in a $100 a night motel room?) The "day room"/lobby is large. Out group of 9 had cocktail hour each of our 4 night stay in one corner of it. The expanded continental breakfast is included. All in all it is a very good value for all the above reasons and the staff(Samantha) is on top of what ever questions and requests you might have.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I made a reservation for a weekend at the Avania inn 3 weeks in advance. I received an email confirmation with the correct date, name and my credit card number. After a 3 hour drive, I arrived at the front desk and the woman said they did not have a reservation for me and no vacant rooms. She was very rude and did not offer me anything. She left me stranded and furious. I ended up finding another inn and had to pay a lot more. I will never go to the Avania Inn again.
reviews.title: Terrible customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The thing is with Santa Barbara it is beautiful and as such is very expensive so you hav eto be prepared to pay more here than other motels or inns in the region. We found the Avania really good value for money- lovely suite with loads of space. Very peaceful in the evenings even at the weekends and just a 2 minute walk to the beach or 10 minutes into town.
reviews.title: Friendly, good locatin and well priced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Got it for $109 for one night on June 5th. Perfect for what we needed. Pulled into town late that evening. Started calling around and this was by far the best price for the quality. There were cheaper places but I assure you on driveby that they were slums. 3 other hotels very nearby were $150 or more. This place was clean and had a FREE CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST. Waffles and all! Very effecient. The lady at the desk isn't overly friendly but she isn't rude either. She was effecient and very to the point but I made no requests of her so she was fine by me. The room was your basic room but she gave us a balcony even tho we were told it would cost more for one when we called. So she gave it to us at no extra charge to our surprise. It was a clean and adequate room. Nothing fancy but we didn't expect that and it accomodated all our needs. Rooms have been redecorated recently you can tell. It's an older hotel, but has been updated properly. Highly recommend. We walked to the harbor and a small park and shopping. GREAT LOCATION!! FREE PARKING~~~
reviews.title: Affordable great location!!
